title-group.article-title: Example eLife article with a simple 'boxed-text' element

boxed-text.p: Related research article Srinivasan S, Kaplan CN, Mahadevan L. 2019. A multiphase theory for spreadingmicrobial swarms and films. eLife 8:e42697. doi: 10.7554/eLife.42697
